Package magellan.library.gamebinding

Class EresseaGameSpecificRules

  • java.lang.Object
    • magellan.library.gamebinding.EresseaGameSpecificRules
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameSpecificRules
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AllanonGameSpecificRules, E3AGameSpecificRules
    public class EresseaGameSpecificRules
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameSpecificRules
    This class implements all Eressea specific rule informations.
    Version:
    1.0, 19.04.2009
    Author:
    Thoralf Rickert
